overview: Featherhead is a poignant tale of a lifelong love that is tested to the limit. As John¹s wife¹s Alzheimer¹s progresses he is barely able to cope and becomes visibly aggressive. Arathi, an elderly Asian neighbour who sees the situation decaying from across the fence must decide if she should intervene. Cultures collide as the situation becomes even more tragic.
tagline: Love lives forever no matter the circumstances
title: Featherhead
